document_data.title: Divining Evil
document_data.mainbody:
'''''Divining Evil''''' is an adventure module set in the ''Forgotten Realms'' using the ''Dungeons & Dragons'' 5{{th}} edition ruleset. It is part of the ''[[Adventurers League/Plague of Ancients|Plague of Ancients]]'' series of adventures published for the [[Adventurers League|D&D Adventurers League]]. It focuses on [[Icewind Dale]], and is an adventure designed for 1{{st}}- to 4{{th}}-level characters.

{{Quote|''A gruesome discovery sets you off into the frozen wastes in search of answers. Will you find the answers you seek, or will your journey leave you with only more questions?''|}}

Index.Creatures: :[[air elemental]] • [[air weird]] • [[ankheg]] • [[chardalyn mephit]] • [[elk]] • [[giant elk]] • [[goliath]] • [[manticore]] • [[remorhaz]] • [[saber-toothed tiger]] • [[Silver dragon|silver dragon wymling]]
